General.Name: Enterprise Diversified Inc
General.Description: ENDI Corp. is a publicly owned investment manager. It primarily provides its services to investment companies. The firm is a an investment adviser to an investment company which provides portfolio management for investment companies. The firm launches and manages fixed income. The firm manages equity. The firm conducts external research to make its investment. ENDI Corp. is based in Pleasantville, New York.
General.Address: 1806 Summit Avenue, Richmond, VA, United States, 23230
